Ceremonies.name: The Gift of False Life
Ceremonies.description: Raise either a single corpse or a group to perform simple single or repetitive tasks.

Ceremonies.name: Knowing Stone
Ceremonies.description: Identify the locations of specific ghosts.

Ceremonies.name: Summon Spirit
Ceremonies.description: Summon a spirit from the underworld.

Ceremonies.name: Traveler's Call
Ceremonies.description: Summon another Shalimite.

Ceremonies.name: Ashen Relic
Ceremonies.description: Preservation of a Kindred's body.

Ceremonies.name: Awaken the Homuncular Servant
Ceremonies.description: Create spies and stalkers out of body parts or small animals

Ceremonies.name: Blinding the Alloy Eye
Ceremonies.description: Cameras cannot perceive the user clearly.

Ceremonies.name: Compel Spirit
Ceremonies.description: Bend a wraith to a vampire's will.

Ceremonies.name: Craft Flesh Golem
Ceremonies.description: Allows you to create a flesh golem from corpse parts.

Ceremonies.name: Create Corpse Suit
Ceremonies.description: Create a semi-sentient pair of human-skin pants that will warn you of danger and ill-will.

Ceremonies.name: Fortezza Sindonica
Ceremonies.description: Create a barrier that harms wraiths.

Ceremonies.name: Harrowhaunt
Ceremonies.description: Keep unwanted visitors from their haven.

Ceremonies.name: Host Spirit
Ceremonies.description: Allows the user to open their body to a ghost for possession.

Ceremonies.name: Maw of Ahriman
Ceremonies.description: Turns one of your orifices into a void of blackness that destorys inserted inanimate objects.

Ceremonies.name: Name of the Father
Ceremonies.description: Strike a victim's mind with the empty void of Oblivion, leaving them paralyzed.

Ceremonies.name: Shambling Hordes
Ceremonies.description: Raise a group of aggressive walking dead.

Ceremonies.name: The Shallow Slumber
Ceremonies.description: Shorten the torpor of another kindred.

Ceremonies.name: Wisdom of the Dead
Ceremonies.description: Gain information from a corpse skull or head.

Ceremonies.name: Befoul Vessel
Ceremonies.description: Turn a mortal's blood into poison for other vampires.

Ceremonies.name: Bind to Mortal Form
Ceremonies.description: Allow a mortal to live on well-past the age they should without ghouling them.

Ceremonies.name: Bind the Spirit
Ceremonies.description: Bind a wraith to a specific location or person.

Ceremonies.name: Death Rattle
Ceremonies.description: Inflict the sensory experience of a wraith's death onto a target.

Ceremonies.name: Split the Veil
Ceremonies.description: Create a tear into a shroud to allow wraiths to enter.

Ceremonies.name: Ex Nihilo
Ceremonies.description: Enter the Shadowlands.

Ceremonies.name: Gift of True Life
Ceremonies.description: Transfer life from one mortal to another, prolonging the life of one while shortening the other.

Ceremonies.name: Lazarene Blessing
Ceremonies.description: Bring a fresh corpse back to life.

Ceremonies.name: Pit of Contemplation
Ceremonies.description: Cast an enemy into Oblivion itself.
